structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: The death of a disseizor while seized of property shall not be such descent in law as to take away the right of entry of any person who has such right at the death of the disseizor, unless the disseizor has had fifteen (15) years' peaceable possession after the disseizin was committed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2340.
